body:
The recipe previously did not include -DWITH_JASPER as something that could be specified one way or the other.
Other edits:
 * BUILD_IPP_IW is BUILD instead of WITH; it was in a different section of the CMakeLists.txt. Move it to the top, as that section is before the one with the WITHs
 * Several options were missing :BOOL
 * -DWITH_ZLIB doesn't actually exist as an option

(I'm just going to hope that the options in the opencv recipe previously are the only ones people want, there is a _lot_ of potential busywork there)
title: Fix OpenCV JasPer disable
